description:
toodleTasks Phone Edition is a task management application for HP webos that sync with toodledo (www.toodledo.com) 

* Manage your lists (projects, contexts, goals, location) and view tasks by lists 
* Manage your tasks (name, project, context, goal, location, due date, due time, reminder, reapeat, priority, tags, status, notes) 
* Create and manage subtasks (with a toodledo pro account) 
* Filter and sort tasks * Quick-add tasks 
* Full text search * Actions on multiple tasks (assign to a list, mark complete, star, delete,...) * Add tasks and search for tasks with "just type" * Auto-Sync at startup and when the app is closed 
* Experimental support for background sync 

toodleTasks make it easy to manage your tasks and todo or implement David Allen's GTD methodology on webos
